content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I successfully appended "Learn a new musical instrument!" to "productive_things_to_do.txt". I then ran the command "read_file" on the same file and received a list of over 100 productive things to do when bored, including "Learn a new language!" and "Learn a new musical instrument!". Additionally, Clockify was promoted as a free time tracking software.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "replace_in_file", "args": {"filename": "productive_things_to_do.txt", "old_text": "Learn a new language!", "new_text": "Learn a new programming language!", "occurrence_index": 1}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command replace_in_file returned: Occurrence index 1 is out of range for Learn a new language! in /home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/productive_things_to_do.txt', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_python_code", "args": {"code": "print(\'Hello, world!\')", "basename": "hello_world.py"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command execute_python_code returned: Hello, world!\n', type='action_result')]
"""
